description:
'''Burden of a Day''' was an American [[post-hardcore]] band from [[Sarasota, Florida]], formed in January 2000. The band was signed to Rise Records and were influenced by bands such as [[Thrice]], [[The Bled]], [[All That Remains (band)|All That Remains]]. They played their final show in Sarasota on March 6, 2010. Burden of a Day started as a worship band in church, until they were moved to reach out to people with their music.{{citation needed|date=July 2022}}

Most of the members of Burden of a Day are still together, working on their new, untitled album. These members include Morgan, Terry and Kyle. The upcoming album will be released under a new band name and with a fresh style of music. This band is called Colours and currently have three songs released on YouTube: "The Illusionist", "The Machine", and "The Passenger".
